name: Hydrↀzoa
description:
There are days of inspiration and days of creative blocks. There are also these very rare moments of epiphany. It usually starts with a "What if". Is that moment when your brain brings symphony amongst your creation, and the knowledge and skills you're applying in your craft. This very piece is the result and documentation of a similar moment i experienced not long ago. I was well aware of the beautiful patterns all the various Diffusion Reaction algorithms can produce. I also knew how to imitate a cheap version of them in Touchdesigner; or by using its proper-academic-heavy-math way in Processing; But it seemed like a waste of time to even try that on P5js, unless using a postcard sized canvas or WEBGL. But here we are...Drawing nothing but a single ellipse.

....
- Not a movie; all graphics generated in 100% real-time.
- P5js, no WEBGL/Shaders, no use of the pixels array.
- Same technique used on my piece "Amigel-50" (OBJKT#309152).
- View it on IPFS for a Full Screen experience.
- Executable code 868 bytes.
....

Twitter: @aevin_io
